summary: After destroying a Seminole fort, American soldiers and their rescued companions must face the dangerous Everglades and hostile Indians in order to reach safety.
cast: Gary Cooper|Mari Aldon|Richard Webb|Ray Teal|Arthur Hunnicutt|Robert Barrat|Dany Aldon|Carl Andre|Mel Archer|Gregg Barton|Jere Beery Sr.|George Bell|Jimmie Booth|Rudy Bowman|Beverly Brandon|Bob Burns|Sidney Capo|Larry Carper|Clancy Cooper|Bob Folkerson|Carl Harbaugh|Adeline Hiatt|George Huggins|Roy Jenson|Johnny Kern|Kenneth MacDonald|Casey MacGregor|Cactus Mack|Angelita McCall|Lee Roberts|David Rocklen|George Scanlan|Ginger Stanley|George Walsh|Dan White|Jack Williams|Sheb Wooley
title: Tambores lejanos
